hero.title: A chrome plugin tool that can help you sorting Facebook ADS Library
hero.tip: You can resort facebook ads by uses.

pricing.headTips: We offer a free plan for all users, and a premium plan for those who want to unlock more features.
pricing.otherTips: No credit card required. Cancel anytime.
label: Sorted data volumes

testimonial.content: This plugin is very useful, it can easily sort ads by usage quantity, saving me a lot of time.
testimonial.author: Emma Johnson

testimonial.content: Fb Ad Sorter significantly improves the efficiency of ad filtering, featuring a clean and intuitive interface, and making ad sorting incredibly convenient. Highly recommended!
testimonial.author: William Brown

testimonial.content: Simplifying the ad screening workflow and making ad analytics more visual and straightforward. A godsend for advertising professionals! This plugin has drastically improved my productivity at work.
testimonial.author: John Smith

testimonial.content: Finally, there"s a tool that can quickly find popular ads. It"s really convenient!
testimonial.author: Olivia Jones

testimonial.content: Sorting ads is super useful and has really boosted my work efficiency.
testimonial.author: James Davis

testimonial.content: Sort ads with one click, saving time and effort. No more manual filtering. The plugin runs smoothly, and the ad sorting results are impressive. Very satisfied.
testimonial.author: Sophia Garcia

testimonial.content: Sorting ads in the ad library is now super clear and finding ads has become so much easier. It"s really handy, simple to use, and very practical. Great job!
testimonial.author: Benjamin Martinez

testimonial.content: Easy to use, clean interface, this plugin makes ad management much more efficient and the user experience is great.
testimonial.author: Isabella Wilson

testimonial.content: This is an awesome extension! It quickly sorts ads by usage, super convenient. Highly recommend it to everyone!
testimonial.author: Michael Taylor
